document.full_text: vimpelcom will next week seek talks with algeria on a disputed unit of orascom telecom after completing a deal to buy orascom and other telecoms assets of egyptian tycoon naguib sawiris.
document.title: vimpelcom eyes talks with algeria after wind deal
lines_and_colors: vimpelcom will next week seek talks with algeria on a disputed unit of orascom telecom after completing a deal to buy orascom and other telecoms assets of egyptian tycoon naguib sawiris.
